question: [Brief] Norsk: Oppgi which integer bin occurs most frequently basert pa histogrammet.

qas.question: [Brief] Norsk: Oppgi which integer bin occurs most frequently basert pa histogrammet.
[Challenge] Nederlands: Meld how many samples were used in total vanuit het histogram.
[Detailed] Portugues: Informe how many entries fall inside the modal bin com base no histograma.
